LanguageData.AC_DragonianSteak.label: Dragonian Steak
LanguageData.AC_DragonianSteak.description: Dragonians once stood at the top of the food chain, until someone discovered that their meat contains five times more protein than GuineaPigZilla(Giga Pig). \nTheir flesh is notoriously tough to cut, but cooking them is still easier than killing them.
